value.label: Tick applicable

options.text: Status Not Required Based On Risk Assessment

fields.text: Part D.1: Other Housesehold Member VCA Sub Populations 0-17Years

fields.label: Is the index VCA a C/ALHIV, HEI, Victim of Sexual Violence, or Children of FSW?
Do all the siblings/other household members 0-17 years know their HIV status?

fields.text: Please Offer HIV index testing/collect DBS if VCA is HEI as part of enrollment for children/adolescents with unknown status

fields.label: Are there children/adolescents who are HIV+ and active on treatment?

fields.text: If HIV+ and active on treatment,categorize as an index C/ALHIV VCA

fields.label: Are there children/adolescents who are HIV+ and NOT active on treatment?

fields.text: If HIV+ and NOT active on treatment, refer to treatment and care as part if enrollment

fields.label: Is the female caregiver HIV-positive (WLHIV)?
Do all the biological children 0-17 years of the Caregiver know their HIV status?

fields.text: Offer index testing as part of enrollment for all biological children 0-17 years and DBS for all HEIs

fields.label: If other household member 0-2 years is HEI, are they receiving breastfeeding?

fields.text: Categorize as HEI VCA

fields.label: If there are children in the household aged 0-5 years, are they enrolled in an Early Childhood Development Program and are their developmental milestones tracked?

fields.text: Refer to ECD Services at Enrollment

fields.label: Have all children and adolescents in the household been screened for malnutrition?

fields.text: Refer children and adolescents for nutrition screening or screen using mid upper arm circumference and refer malnourished children to therapeutic and supplementary feeding and offer the household nutrition counseling

fields.label: If HEI receiving breastfeeding, are they receiving HIV testing and drugs to prevent HIV transmission and other infections in line with guidelines

fields.text: If not refer and provide preventive care and support services as part of enrollment

fields.label: Are there household members 0-17years that are victims of Sexual Violence
Have the victims of Sexual Violence received clinical care(PEP, HIV testing, emergency contraceptive, STI testing, psychosocial counseling)

fields.text: Categorize as Victim of Sexual Violence VCA. Refer to appropriate clinical services as part of enrollment

fields.label: Have the victims of Sexual Violence received non-clinical care (legal services)

fields.text: Categorize as Victim of Sexual Violence VCA. Refer to appropriate non-clinical services as part of enrollment

fields.label: Are the VCAs in the household receiving age-appropriate HIV and sexual violence preventive interventions

fields.text: Refer household to age-appropriate interventions at enrollment

fields.label: Have all the male HIV-negative VCA in the household 15 years and above received voluntary medical male circumcision (VMMC)?

fields.text: Refer to VMMC services at enrollment
Part D.2: For Adolescent Girls & Young Women (AGYW) 10-17 Years

fields.repeating_group_label: For questions in this section, ask EACH OF THE AGYW 10–17 years old in the household who is not an AGYW Index VCA, in privacy. Probe where needed.

v_regex.err: Name of Adolescent can only contain letters
Name of Adolescent can only contain letters

value.label: Is the AGYW 10 -17 years?
Is the AGYW sexually active?
Is the AGYW having sex with older men??
Is the AGYW engaged in transactional sex?
Is the AGYW engaged in sex work?
Is the AGYW food or economically secure?
Did the AGYW marry early (child marriage)?
Did the AGYW give birth before the age of 18(teen mom)?
Does the AGYW have a partner who is violent or has experienced violence?
Has the AGYW ever been diagnosed with a sexually transmitted illness(STI)?
Has the AGYW been tested for HIV?
Did the AGYW test positive for HIV?

value.text: Categorize AGYW as CLHIV and refer to appropriate treatment and care services at enrollment

value.label: Is the AGYW in school? If not, refer to education support services at enrollment
Is the AGYW receiving an economic strengthening intervention? If not refer to age-appropriate economic strengthening services/DREAMS program at enrollment
Is the AGYW using any of these HIV/pregnancy prevention methods?If ‘None of the prevention methods’, Refer and/or provide appropriate preventive services/DREAMS program at enrolment
Did AGYW answer “yes” to any of the questions from DII.1 to DII.10 and is HIV-? (If yes, categorize as At risk AGYW)

fields.text: Part E: For Primary Caregivers Only

fields.label: Have you experienced violence in the home in the last six months?
Have the children experienced violence in the home in the last six months??
Do you know your HIV status?
If HIV positive/WLHIV, are you active on treatment?
Are you virally suppressed as of your most recent viral load test?

fields.hint: Result of most recent viral load test.

v_numeric.err: Viral load can only contain numbers

v_regex.err: Please enter a valid  test name

fields.label: If HIV+, do you have biological children 0-2 years?
Are you and your biological children enrolled in the PMTCT program?

Are there any reasons you may be at risk for HIV? 
(If Yes, state reason: ………………………………………………………………………………. And provide appropriate preventive services as part of enrollment)

options.hint: State reasons might be at risk of hiv

fields.label: Is your household food, socially and economically secure? (for example: Able to provide 3 meals per day/ all school-going children enrolled in school; lowest level of education is secondary school; single-headed household; child-headed household; main material of the floor is not earth/sand; Has source of income through stable employment or is engaged in farming/livestock farming etc.). If not, refer to appropriate household economic strengthening program/Government Social Protection program at enrollment
